member.remarks: The currency symbol contained in the request has nothing to do with the format, but it will be put into the formatted value. How to format the currency is determined by the channel locale or company language. e.g. [$, 123.46] (en-US) -> $123.46. [, 123.46] (fr-FR) -> 123,46 . [$, 123.46] (fr-FR) -> 123,46 $.
